name: pongo
description: Pong game with Rust + WebGPU + Cloudflare Durable Objects

scripts.test:all: cargo fmt --check && cargo check --workspace && cargo clippy --workspace -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace
scripts.build:server: cd lobby_worker && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../worker/pkg && cp index.html ../worker/pkg/index.html
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
